name: National Outreach and Communication
objective: To improve communications with anglers, boaters, and the general public regarding angling and boating opportunities, to reduce barriers to participation in these activities, to advance adoption of sound fishing and boating practices, to promote conservation and the responsible use of the nation's aquatic resources, and to further safety in fishing and boating.

results.description: A single cooperative agreement was funded to implement the program nationally. In addition to completing national outreach efforts, the cooperative agreement recipient provided subgrant award opportunities to state fish and wildlife agencies and other organizations for programs to increase fishing and boating participation.  Federal funds were leveraged by $10,162,524 of cash and in-kind contributions.

The program received 4 applications and issued a single five-year cooperative agreement. In addition, the award recipient provided subgrant awards to state fish and wildlife agencies and other organizations for programs to increase fishing and boating participation.

Funds were awarded to the recipient selected in FY18 to continue to implement the program nationally. The recipient provided subgrant award opportunities to state fish and wildlife agencies and other organizations for programs to increase fishing and boating participation.

Funds were awarded to the recipient selected in FY18 to continue to implement the program nationally. The recipient provided subgrant award opportunities to state fish and wildlife agencies and other organizations for programs to increase fishing and boating participation.

Funds awarded to the recipient selected in FY18 to continue to implement the program nationally. The recipient provided subgrant award opportunities to state fish and wildlife agencies and other organizations for programs to increase fishing and boating participation.
The program issued 1 continuation award to the recipient selected in FY18.
Program received 8 applications and issued 1 award.
Program issued 1 continuation award to the recipient selected in FY23.
Program expects to issue 1 continuation award to the recipient selected in FY2023.

authorizations.text: Transportation Equity Act for the 21st Century (23 U.S.C. 101 §7402), and Sportfishing and Boating Safety Act—National Outreach and Communications Program (16 U.S.C. §777g(d)).

rules_regulations: Guidelines and literature on the U.S. Fish and Wildlife Service programs is available at: http://www.fws.gov. Federal financial assistance regulations can be accessed at: https://edit.doi.gov/pam/programs/financial_assistance/award.
